abstract: Byron D. Trott, the former Goldman Sachs banker and adviser to Warren E. Buffett, has raised more than $2 billion for his new investment and advisory firm, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: Byron D. Trott, the former Goldman Sachs banker and adviser to Warren E. Buffett, has raised more than $2 billion for his new investment and advisory firm, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Byron D. Trott, the former Goldman Sachs banker and adviser to Warren E. Buffett, has raised more than $2 billion for his new investment and advisory firm, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Ex-Goldman Banker Said to Raise $2 Billion for P.E.
